document.full_text: indian musician ravi shankar and asian versions of shakespeare are among highlights of this year's edinburgh international festival, as eif director jonathan mills completes a five-year artistic tour of the world.
document.title: oriental shakespeare, ravi shankar at edinburgh festival
lines_and_colors: indian musician ravi shankar and asian versions of shakespeare are among highlights of this year's edinburgh international festival, as eif director jonathan mills completes a five-year artistic tour of the world.
